definition: you (informal, as opposed to courteous 您[nin2])
to chase after/to seek/to do one's utmost to seek or procure sth/to recall
to overtake/to catch up with/to hurry/to rush/to try to catch (the bus etc)/to drive (cattle etc) forward/to drive (sb) away/to avail oneself of (an opportunity)/until

sentences.english: Trucks and cars were  leapfrogging along the expressway.
sentences.chinese: 卡車和小汽車在高速公路上你追我趕。

sentences.english: We are living in a rushed rhythm.
sentences.chinese: 生活在你追我趕的節奏裏。
